attributes.action: Stop the PIP Welfare cuts, disabled punished for inept goverment spending
attributes.additional_details:
Again the government seek to punish the least able of all our citizens! The disabled again are marginalised and targeted simply because they can't fight back. Our government overspend and the disabled must pay the price of a inept goverment.
Leave the PIP payments alone.
attributes.background: The government needs to stop the review into current reduction of PIP Welfare benefits!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918
